name: Zenaton Samples - Product Return Workflow
description: This Workflow optimizes a customer product return process by automating internal processes and interfacing with external services.

ZENATON_APP_ID.description: The Zenaton Application ID (find it on https://app.zenaton.com/api)

ZENATON_API_TOKEN.description: The Zenaton API token (find it on https://app.zenaton.com/api)

ZENDESK_EMAIL.description: Email address associated with your ZenDesk account
